about_the_game:
Howdy settlers! Making the long journey west to start a new life? Then forget the delicious New England clam chowder in the fine Boston restaurants, you'll have to cook for yourself. And you won't find the multi-storey brick houses of New York in Wyoming or Nevada, you'll have to build the house of your dreams yourself out of wood and mud. But don't despair - after all, you're holding the Settlers Guide to the Wild West in your hands, which will answer all your questions ... 3 books will introduce you to many game mechanics, values and hidden game information paired with tips, tricks and delicious recipes:

The Wild West Cookbook: contains information, values and tips on dishes and drinks in the game. There are also delicious recipes to try out. So you don't just experience Wild West Dynasty with your eyes and ears, you can even smell and taste the West! A must for every Wild West Dynasty fan!

The Wild West Architect: Building your own farm or even your own town is an important game element in Wild West Dynasty. In this book you will learn everything about the houses that can be built, their costs, requirements and what they are used for. In addition, there are some tips, tricks and background knowledge about building in the game.

The Wild West Compendium: What can be bought or made? Where can I get it and at what price? Where can I find Hancock's cave or the rebellious town of Taxation? The compendium aims to answer these and many more questions.

Like the game itself, the 3 books are still in "Early Access". As the game grows, the books will also receive new and updated content. Game updates, updates, new areas and possibilities will be constantly updated and brought up to date in the books. An update of the books is planned approximately every 2-4 months depending on the update status of the game in the Early Access phase.

IMPORTANT INFO:
After the "installation", the three books will be saved as a PDF in your game folder. You can find them in the game folder of Steam, which can be found in a standard installation under Steam\SteamApps\common\Wild West Dynasty\A Settlers Guide to the Wild West Content.

Note: Only availabe in English and German language.

short_description: So you're off to the Wild West? Then you'd better know a few things about it so that you don't fail miserably. In 3 books, fans will find information, help, tips and tricks about building, cooking, buying and crafting in Wild West Dynasty.
